mapper.insert: insert /* WamTblMapMapper.insert */ into WAM_TBL_MAP (TBL_MAP_ID, MAP_DF_ID, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_VERS, OBJ_DESCN, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, MAP_DF_TYPE, MAP_SNO, TBL_MAP_TYPE, TGT_SUBJ_ID, TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH, TGT_DB_ID, TGT_DB_PNM, TGT_TBL_ID, TGT_TBL_LNM, TGT_TBL_PNM, TGT_FLF_TYPE, SRC_BIZ_ID, SRC_BIZ_NM, SRC_SYS_ID, SRC_SYS_NM, SRC_DB_ID, SRC_DB_PNM, SRC_TBL_ID, SRC_TBL_LNM, SRC_TBL_PNM, SLT_SKP_CND_NM, JN_CND_NM, APP_CRGP_ID, APP_CRGP_NM, CNVS_CRGP_ID, CNVS_CRGP_NM, REF_DESCN, PRE_FLF_DESCN, TGT_CHRG) values (#{tblMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapDfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mapSno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tblMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtSubjAllPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgtFlfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcSysNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sltSkpCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jnCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnvsCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cnvsCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preFlfDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tgtChrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update /* WamTblMapMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAM_TBL_MAP
MAP_DF_ID = #{mapDfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAP_DF_TYPE = #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAP_SNO = #{mapSno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TBL_MAP_TYPE = #{tblMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_SUBJ_ID = #{tgtSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH = #{tgtSubjAllPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DB_ID = #{tgtDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_DB_PNM = #{tgtDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_TBL_ID = #{tgtTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_TBL_LNM = #{tgtTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_TBL_PNM = #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_FLF_TYPE = #{tgtFlfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_BIZ_ID = #{srcBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_BIZ_NM = #{srcBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_SYS_ID = #{srcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_SYS_NM = #{srcSysNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DB_ID = #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_DB_PNM = #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_ID = #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_LNM = #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_TBL_PNM = #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SLT_SKP_CND_NM = #{sltSkpCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JN_CND_NM = #{jnCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_CRGP_ID = #{appCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

CNVS_CRGP_NM = #{cnvsCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PRE_FLF_DESCN = #{preFlfDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TGT_CHRG = #{tgtChrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TBL_MAP_ID = #{tblMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update /* WamTblMapMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAM_TBL_MAP set MAP_DF_ID = #{mapDfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_DF_TYPE = #{mapDfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAP_SNO = #{mapSno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TBL_MAP_TYPE = #{tblMapType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_SUBJ_ID = #{tgtSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH = #{tgtSubjAllPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DB_ID = #{tgtDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_DB_PNM = #{tgtDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_TBL_ID = #{tgtTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_TBL_LNM = #{tgtTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_TBL_PNM = #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_FLF_TYPE = #{tgtFlfType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_BIZ_ID = #{srcBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_BIZ_NM = #{srcBizNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_SYS_ID = #{srcSysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_SYS_NM = #{srcSysNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DB_ID = #{srcDbId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_DB_PNM = #{srcDbPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_ID = #{srcTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_LNM = #{srcTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TBL_PNM = #{srcTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SLT_SKP_CND_NM = #{sltSkpCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JN_CND_NM = #{jnCndNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CRGP_ID = #{appCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_CRGP_NM = #{appCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CNVS_CRGP_ID = #{cnvsCrgpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CNVS_CRGP_NM = #{cnvsCrgpNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REF_DESCN = #{refDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRE_FLF_DESCN = #{preFlfDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TGT_CHRG = #{tgtChrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TBL_MAP_ID = #{tblMapId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select /* WamTblMapMapper.selectTblMapList */
, GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM from WAM_TBL_MAP A
AND A.MAP_DF_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{mapDfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND (A.TGT_TBL_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') OR A.TGT_TBL_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND IFNULL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH,'X') LIKE CONCAT(#{tgtSubjAllPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

select /* WamTblMapMapper.selectTblMapListForColMap */
, GET_USER_NM(A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID) AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.RQST_USER_ID) AS RQST_USER_NM , GET_USER_NM(A.APRV_USER_ID) AS APRV_USER_NM from WAM_TBL_MAP A
EXISTS ( SELECT B.MAP_DF_ID FROM WAM_COL_MAP B WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = B.MAP_DF_ID AND IFNULL(A.SRC_TBL_PNM,'X') = IFNULL(B.SRC_TBL_PNM,'X') UNION SELECT B.MAP_DF_ID FROM WAM_COL_MAP B WHERE A.MAP_DF_ID = B.MAP_DF_ID AND IFNULL(B.COL_MAP_TYPE,'2') = '2' -- 잘못된 컬럼매핑정의서 삭제를 위하여 나중에 주석처리나 1로 변경해야함.. )
AND A.MAP_DF_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{mapDfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND (A.TGT_TBL_PNM LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%') OR A.TGT_TBL_LNM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tgtTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND IFNULL(A.TGT_SUBJ_ALL_PATH,'X') LIKE CONCAT(#{tgtSubjAllPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
